statements: SELECT * FROM Vendors
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name FROM Vendors WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name, delivery_schedule FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Vendors WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM Vendors WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, vendor_name FROM Vendors WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_schedule FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_id <= 50;
SELECT * FROM Vendors WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND delivery_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, delivery_schedule FROM Vendors WHERE delivery_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
SELECT * FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendors
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_product FROM suppliers
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE LENGTH(vendor_address) > 20;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_product = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM vendor_relationships ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT contact_person, phone_number FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_name = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 5;
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date FROM supplier_information JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_information.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM vendor_relationships WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, address, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM supplier_information JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_information.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id;

SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name, delivery_date FROM vendor_relationships JOIN supplier_information ON vendor_relationships.vendor_id = supplier_information.supplier_id JOIN delivery_schedules ON supplier_information.supplier_id = delivery_schedules.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_schedules WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM vendors JOIN deliveries ON vendors.vendor_id = deliveries.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM deliveries GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(delivery_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vendors INNER JOIN deliveries ON vendors.vendor_id = deliveries.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_phone FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders
SELECT schedule_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_schedules
